thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Harrison Spain
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Harrison Spain

author: Harrison Spain
title: Harrison Spain
text:
PRTG was implemented with the simple idea. We would like to know about a problem before customers embarrass us.
It turns out that PRTG is so robust, it lets us know about problem WELL in advance of becoming a customer issue. For example, when our SSL certificates are ready to expire, or when a disk is running short on space.
PRTG has so many sensors, I've never come across an instance where it fell short. PRTG implemented a "cloud" view of our customer facing web pages. When PRTG is "green", I have confidence our customers are being serviced.
We looked at all sorts of monitoring tools. PRTG gets lost in the crowd of "we can do that!" tools. Look at PRTG. you will NOT be disappointed.
